rules_text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a Crab, Fish, Jellyfish, Kraken, Leviathan, Merfolk, Nautilus, Octopus, Otter, Oyster, Pirate, Seal, Serpent, Shark, Shrimp, Sponge, Squid, Starfish, Trilobite, Turtle, Whale, or Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
